posts.post_title: WTB T206 severe Miscuts.. and Ghosts
posts.post_content:
If you want auction house pricing for your card without having to wait 60 days to collect the money.. I'm looking to add a new freak card to my collection.. any one interested in selling a card please email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url]

Im also looking for a T206 Foster/thornton/scoops with a hindu back.

jamie
